ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | phlsrng.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | phllmhm.h | |- ., = ( .i ` W ) |
| 3 |  | phllmhm.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 4 |  | ipdir.f | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 5 |  | ipass.s | |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) |
| 6 |  | ipass.p | |- .X. = ( .r ` F ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. V |-> ( x ., C ) ) = ( x e. V |-> ( x ., C ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 7 | #P_phllmhm | |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ C e. V ) -> ( x e. V |-> ( x ., C ) ) e. ( W LMHom ( ringLMod ` F ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3ad2antr3 | |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( x e. V |-> ( x ., C ) ) e. ( W LMHom ( ringLMod ` F ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpr1 | |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> A e. K ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simpr2 | |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> B e. V ) |
| 12 |  | #P_rlmvsca | |- ( .r ` F ) = ( .s ` ( ringLMod ` F ) ) |
| 13 | 6, 12 | #P_eqtri | |- .X. = ( .s ` ( ringLMod ` F ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 4, 3, 5, 13 | #P_lmhmlin | |- ( ( ( x e. V |-> ( x ., C ) ) e. ( W LMHom ( ringLMod ` F ) ) /\ A e. K /\ B e. V ) -> ( ( x e. V |-> ( x ., C ) ) ` ( A .x. B ) ) = ( A .X. ( ( x e. V |-> ( x ., C ) ) ` B ) ) ) |
| 15 | 9, 10, 11, 14 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( ( x e. V |-> ( x ., C ) ) ` ( A .x. B ) ) = ( A .X. ( ( x e. V |-> ( x ., C ) ) ` B ) ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_phllmod | |- ( W e. PreHil -> W e. LMod ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> W e. LMod ) |
| 18 | 3, 1, 5, 4 | #P_lmodvscl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ A e. K /\ B e. V ) -> ( A .x. B ) e. V ) |
| 19 | 17, 10, 11, 18 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( A .x. B ) e. V ) |
| 20 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( x = ( A .x. B ) -> ( x ., C ) = ( ( A .x. B ) ., C ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( x ., C ) e. _V |
| 22 | 20, 7, 21 | #P_fvmpt3i | |- ( ( A .x. B ) e. V -> ( ( x e. V |-> ( x ., C ) ) ` ( A .x. B ) ) = ( ( A .x. B ) ., C ) ) |
| 23 | 19, 22 | #P_syl | |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( ( x e. V |-> ( x ., C ) ) ` ( A .x. B ) ) = ( ( A .x. B ) ., C ) ) |
| 24 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( x = B -> ( x ., C ) = ( B ., C ) ) |
| 25 | 24, 7, 21 | #P_fvmpt3i | |- ( B e. V -> ( ( x e. V |-> ( x ., C ) ) ` B ) = ( B ., C ) ) |
| 26 | 11, 25 | #P_syl | |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( ( x e. V |-> ( x ., C ) ) ` B ) = ( B ., C ) ) |
| 27 | 26 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( A .X. ( ( x e. V |-> ( x ., C ) ) ` B ) ) = ( A .X. ( B ., C ) ) ) |
| 28 | 15, 23, 27 | #P_3eqtr3d | |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( ( A .x. B ) ., C ) = ( A .X. ( B ., C ) ) ) |
